page.title: 02Intro. Hoo area cont.
page.content: People in this part of Suffolk seem to enjoy solitude.Despite the remote rural aspect with few shops there are fairly frequent deliveries of milk,groceries & fish.There is a mobile library and a weekly refuse collection.Bus services are very infrequent with a service to Ipswich, the nearest large town,once a week,& to the nearest small town also once a week. Many men go to work sharing cars on a rota basis so that their wives can have the family car to meet children from school,take children to their activities such as cubs,brownies,music lessons etc. and also do the "bulk" shopping, go to meetings etc.
